## 360 x Quantum LTO for the Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions

- **Tender Reference Number** : SSC-23-00021467:T

### Tender Description
This solicitation aims to acquire a High Performance Computing Server with related technical specifications for the Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions. Interested bidders can register in the Shared Services Canada (SSC) Purchase and Pay (P2P) portal to view and access solicitations, submit responses, receive updates, and be awarded contracts.
